DOC.brief_summary: This is a feasibility study to determine if anti-inflammatory cytokines can be concentrated from patients with osteoarthritis.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study of Anti-inflammatory Cytokines in Whole Blood in Osteoarthritis Patients
DOC.criteria: radiographic evidence of osteoarthritis signed informed consent Pregnancy < 18 years of age blood clotting disorder or active hematologic cancer undergoing chemotherapy history of rheumatoid arthritis septic joint or fracture active infection or history of chronic infection use of cytokine blocking drugs with the last 6 months intraarticular steroid or hyaluronic acid (HA) injection within last 6 months
